QuestData.Title: Seeing Red
QuestData.Description: Ahead of us is the main thrust of the yaungol army.$B$BHere, they prepare their vast army to attack the villages of Kun-Lai.$B$BIf we strike at the Osul now, we can cut them at their very core.$B$BRemember, for every of their number that we strike down here, we save one of our own back at home.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Osul Marauders or Osul Spitfires.
QuestData.CompletionText: I like to attack problems head on.
QuestData.RewardText: That should put a serious dent in their numbers.$B$BI doubt they will be able to recover from such losses.
